cu.explanation_en: Setting the gNB ID to an invalid format 'invalid' will cause parsing errors and prevent the CU from initializing properly.

du.explanation_en: Setting the maximum MIMO layers to an excessively high value of 10 will exceed hardware capabilities and cause configuration validation failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將最大 MIMO 層數設定為過高的值 10，將超過硬體能力，並導致配置驗證失敗。
